question: How would you rate your cooking skills?
options: Beginner: I have little experience in cooking and I need detailed instructions
Intermediate: I have some experience and I know my way around a kitchen
Advanced: I am very experienced and I'm looking for new culinary experiences

question: How often do you cook?
options: Rarely : less than once a week
Occasionally : once or twice a week
Often : more than three days a week

question: Do you have any dietary restrictions? (You can select multiple)
How much time do you put in when cooking a meal?
What kitchen equipment do you have access to? (You can select multiple)
Where are you located? (You can also provide specific countries in Other)
Would you prefer traditional dishes from your region or global cuisines?
Which cuisines do you enjoy? (You can select multiple)
Are there any cuisines or flavors you want to avoid? (You can select multiple)
What flavors do you enjoy most? (You can select multiple)
Are there any flavors you dislike? (You can select multiple)
Do you have a preference for food textures? (You can select multiple)
What proteins do you like? (You can select multiple)
What vegetables or fruits do you like? (You can select multiple)
Which pantry staples do you typically use or prefer? (You can select multiple)
